titles.title: Cardfight!! Vanguard G: Z
カードファイト!! ヴァンガードG Z
Cardfight!! Vanguard G Z
CARDFIGHT!! ヴァンガードG Z
卡片战斗先导者 GZ

anime.description: Diffriders referred to as "Apostles" from Planet Cray descend upon Earth. "Dragon Deity of Destruction, Gyze", who destroys everything. The "Apostles" who envision the revival of Gyze, manipulate the power of the six "Zeroth Dragons" and invade the Earth! Source: Official page

externalentity.identifier: カードファイト!!_ヴァンガード_(アニメ)

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: game
tag.description: Based on an interactive (even if minimally so) form of entertainment software, generally available for PCs, consoles or arcade machines.

tag.name: proxy battles
tag.description: In our terms, a proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode. Often the training aspect is also involved, or in some cases the proxies are nothing more than holographic representatives of some other variation of competition (like for example a card game). While many popular shounen anime fit under this category, it`s not limited to shounen anime.

episode.title: 奪われたクロノ
Chrono Taken
Ubawareta Chrono
episode.summary: With the conclusion of U20, Chrono and the rest return to their daily routines, with no knowledge of the threat of the "Apostles", and Noa returns. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 使徒からの挑戦状
Challenge from the Apostles
Shito kara no Chousenjou
episode.summary: Saori appears at the Federation of International Vanguard Association abruptly. Ibuki stands with Messiah to face the attack of the new Apostle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼロスドラゴン
Zeroth Dragon
Zeros Dragon
episode.summary: Wandering around in Relics, Chrono and the rest encounter the vanguard of an Apostle, Gastille. At the same time, Taiyou battles against Valeos and the Zeroth Dragon on the surface. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蒼波元帥ヴァレオス
Blue Wave Marshal Valeos
Aonami-gensui Valios
episode.summary: Behind the attack on Chrono and the Federation of International Vanguard Association, Shion battles with another assassin, Valeos. Aiming to destroy Fides, Valeos unleashes the power of the taboo dragon, "Zeroth Dragon". Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 私達がつかんだ未来
The Future We Secured
Watashitachi ga Tsukanda Mirai
episode.summary: Saori ambushes Chrono while he`s under medical care. To protect Chrono, Tokoha stands against the threat of the Zeroth Dragon with a card entrusted to her by the illusion of Miguel! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: レリクス・クライシス
Relics Crisis
Relics Crisis
episode.summary: An illusion stands in the way of the fighters who are fighting to destroy the Relics Generator of the world. What is the view of Chrono, who fights in Relics…? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 粛清のオーバーロード
Purging Overlord
Shukusei no Overload
episode.summary: Kai and Arata searches for the secret base of the Apostles, while Makoto meets up with Kamui and Misaki to sneak into the Apostles` secret research facility. The one who awaits them is the one who became a Diffrider, Wakamizu. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復讐に燃える竜
Dragon Burning with Vengeance
Fukushuu ni Moeru Ryuu
episode.summary: Kazuma and Kazumi searches for a way to rescue Chrono and the rest from Relics. However, Kazuma gets dragged onto an inescapable ship, and fights against Saori, who swore to have his revenge. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命という名の呪い
The Curse Known as Fate
Unmei to Iu Na no Noroi
episode.summary: Chrono takes over the fight and deck from Ibuki, who`s on the verge of losing. Ibuki and Chrono face Gastille to protect each others future. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 邪神司教ガスティール
Evil God Bishop Gastille
Jashin Shikyou Gasteel
episode.summary: Chrono and the rest organizes a Christmas party with the return of Arata and the others. However, behind the scenes, is a fight between Ibuki and Gastille with their lives on the line. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漢[おとこ]のフィニッシュホールド
The Man`s Finishing Hold
Otoko no Finish Hold
episode.summary: Kamui and Misaki come to the rescue of Arata and the rest. For his friends, and for the world, Kamui burns with fighting spirit and manliness, and challenges the formidable Gredora to a fight. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 百害女王[イビルガバナー] グレドーラ
Evil Governor Gredora
Evil Governor Gredora
episode.summary: Arata and Makoto reunite with Noa after being released from the domination of Chaos Breaker. However, the three of them are attacked by Darkface and Gredora, who are chasing after Chaos Breaker. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギーゼの器
The Vessel of Gyze
Giize no Utsuwa
episode.summary: The 3 apostles target Chrono as the strongest "vessel of Gyze". Chaos Breaker unleashes the Zeroth Dragon of Star Gate upon Kazuma and Taiyou, who fight to protect Chrono. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 僕たちが手にした希望
The Hope in Our Hands
Bokutachi ga Te ni Shita Kibou
episode.summary: Valeos stand in the way of Shion, who infiltrated the headquarters of the apostles. To bring an end to the fate between them, Shion challenges Valeos again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 誓いのファイト
Sworn Fight
Chikai no Fight
episode.summary: The units that fought with him, and Kazuma. Chrono feels dejected and powerless upon losing the things important to him, and is challenged to a fight by Kazumi. The result of that fight is… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 終わりの始まり
The Beginning of the End
Owari no Hajimari
episode.summary: Chrono is shocked by the sight he sees as he arrives at the abandoned building that Kazuma and Taiyou were fighting in. The fight that Chrono can`t afford to lose begins. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 破壊の竜神 ギーゼ
Dragon Deity of Destruction, Gyze
Hakai no Ryuujin: Giize
episode.summary: The fight with their positions exchanged begins. Kazumi challenges Gyze with all he has to save Kazuma. Kazumi corners Gyze with Shiranui`s new powers, but Gyze…… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 道化師の選択
Choice of the Jester
Doukeshi no Sentaku
episode.summary: Chaos Breaker appears and decides to target Aichi and Kai. The "Noa" that Arata and Makoto want to bring back is… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦の幕開け
Dawn of the Decisive Battle
Kessen no Makuake
episode.summary: An apostle enters the branch of Vanguard Association in North America to ressurect Gyze completely. Misaki appears as a member of the Defense Team to welcome Darkface, who wants to destroy the facility. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 降臨の地
Land of Descent
Kourin no Chi
episode.summary: TRY3 heads towards the "Land of Descent" where the Master Swordsman Fides once descended upon. The one waiting for them, is none other than Chrono`s father, Rive Shindou. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: EXTRA TURN
Extra Turn
Extra Turn
episode.summary: The vanguards return to their daily lives. The quest system is revived, and the adults have a barbeque as celebration for their efforts. Meanwhile, Chrono heads towards a study session for his ambition to be an astronaut…! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 時空超越
Dimensional Overstride
Jikuu Chouetsu
episode.summary: As TRY3 put their feelings into the future during the fight with Gyze, they awaken the power to Dimensional Overstride! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 挑戦する3人[トライスリー]
TRY3
Try Three
episode.summary: The fate of the two planets, Cray and Earth…… TRY3 is entrusted with the future, and fights Gyze. The ones who come to talk to Chrono and his friends, are them from that day. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 虚無と先導者
The Void and Vanguard
Kyomu to Sendousha
episode.summary: The world is swallowed by the void, and faces destruction. The only ones who can stop the corrosion of the void are the vanguards, and their friends around the world…! The final battle between TRY3 and Gyze begins. Source: crunchyroll
